Freak Show is a LARP and a work of art that explores otherness. The participants will experience the last days and the final performance of the last freak show. This is a romantic horror story in the gothic style, about a family of outcasts and freaks struggling to survive in a hostile world. The freaks have made a deal with the promise of sanctuary and are practising for their performance, but what is the cost? In the end, as the last song fades away, the devil will come to take them all to perform for him forever.

The Freak Show in Short

Number of roles 45 ½
Price â‚¬350. We have two Larpfund tickets at half price. If you are cast we expect payment within 30 days via bank transfer or Paypal.
Location An abandoned amusement park in Vaasa, Finland. We are organising an optional bus from Helsinki.
Game dates 15–18 September, 2017. (Friday 20:00–Monday 10:00)
Application opens February 23, 2017

The Freak Show is a Nordic style larp that tells the story of the last days of a circus and freak show. It will be held in an abandoned amusement park in Finland in the autumn of 2017. The participants will experience both the magic and the tragedy of being the other as one of the freaks aligned against a hostile world. The theme of this collaborative work is otherness. We aim for full 360 degree immersion in a romantic gothic horror story setting. This event is not suitable for children.
